vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἰῶτα [ῐ], τό,
indeclinable, (Hebrew yôd) the letter ι, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 line, stroke, on a sundial, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__3 proverbial, of anything very small, smallest letter, jot, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: - "iota", the name of the eighth letter of the Greek alphabet, put (figuratively) for a very small part of anything
vocabInfos.mediumDef: - "iota", the name of the eighth letter of the Greek alphabet, put (figuratively) for a very small part of anything
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jota (= yod, letra más pequeña del alfabeto hebreo)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 希伯來字母 `, 最小的字母
1a) 因此等同於最小的一部份(太 5:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 希伯来字母 `, 最小的字母
1a) 因此等同于最小的一部份(太 5:18)
